Package nl.esciencecenter.neon.shaders

GLSL Shader wrapper packages for Object-Oriented shader-enabled programming.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FragmentShader
    Fragment shader object representation.
    GeometryShader
    Geometry shader object representation.
    Shader
    Generic abstract shader class with most of the implementation specifics shared by all shaders.
    ShaderCreator
    Example class for shader-source string creation.
    ShaderProgram
    This library's interpretation of a Shader program.
    ShaderProgramLoader
    Loader/convenience class for ShaderProgram instances.
    VertexShader
    Vertex shader object representation.

Package nl.esciencecenter.neon.shaders Description

GLSL Shader wrapper packages for Object-Oriented shader-enabled programming.
